doc.title: Nine Days Wonder
doc.plot: After his Great Aunt Eleanor's (who's dead recipe for Snickerdoodles is to die for) viewing, Julian Lytle, a quiet dishwasher, rescues Velouria Jordan, daughter of the Mayor, from her boyfriend Troy, comedy ensues. The unlikely pair, along with Julian's best friend and neighbor, Ross, find themselves and each other as they are thrust into a quirky world filled with punk rockers, a student loan shark, greedy, crooked politicians, the drive-by media, the Spanish Italian mafia, a hit man and 2 gun wielding line cooks.
